00022     typedef std::pair<double,double> XYCoords;

00032     class EcalHexReadout {
00033 
00034         public:
00035 
00041             EcalHexReadout(double moduleMinR = defaultMinR, double gap = defaultGap_, unsigned nCellsWide = defaultNCellsWide);
00042 
00046             virtual ~EcalHexReadout() {
00047                 delete ecalMap_;
00048             }
00049 
00053             int combineID(int cellID, int moduleID) const {
00054               return 10*cellID+moduleID;
00055             }
00056 
00060             std::pair<int,int> separateID(int cellModuleID) const {
00061               return std::pair<int,int>(cellModuleID/10, cellModuleID % 10);
00062             }
00063 
00067             XYCoords getModuleCenter(int moduleID) const {
00068                 return modulePositionMap_.at(moduleID);
00069             }
00070 
00074             int getModuleID(double x, double y) const {
00075                 int bestID = -1;
00076                 double bestDist = 1E6;
00077                 for(auto const& module : modulePositionMap_) {  
00078                     int mID   = module.first;
00079                     double mX = module.second.first;
00080                     double mY = module.second.second;
00081                     double dist = sqrt( (x-mX)*(x-mX) + (y-mY)*(y-mY) );
00082                     if(dist < moduler_) return mID;
00083                     if(dist < bestDist) { bestID = mID; bestDist = dist; }
00084                 }
00085                 return bestID;
00086             }
00087 
00094             int getCellIDRelative(double x, double y) const {
00095                 int bin = ecalMap_->FindBin(x,y)-1; // NB FindBin indices starts from 1, our maps start from 0
00096                 if(bin < 0) {
00097                     TString error_msg = TString("[EcalHexReadout::getCellIDRelative] Relative coordinates are outside module hexagon!") + 
00098                                         TString::Format(" Is the gap used by EcalHexReadout (%.2f mm) and the minimum module radius (%.2f mm)",gap_,moduler_) +
00099                                         TString::Format(" the same as hexagon_gap and Hex_radius in ecal.gdml? Received (x,y) = (%.2f,%.2f).",x,y);
00100                     throw std::invalid_argument(error_msg.Data());
00101                 }
00102                 return bin;
00103             }
00104 
00112             int getCellModuleID(double x, double y) const {
00113                 int moduleID = getModuleID(x,y);
00114                 double relX = x - getModuleCenter(moduleID).first;
00115                 double relY = y - getModuleCenter(moduleID).second;
00116                 int cellID = getCellIDRelative(relX,relY);
00117                 int cellModuleID = combineID(cellID,moduleID);
00118                 return cellModuleID;
00119             }
00120 
00126             XYCoords getCellCenterRelative(int cellID) const {
00127                 // this map search is probably just as fine as the TList search for the cell in ecalMap.
00128                 //   wonder why TH2Poly->GetBin(ID) doesn't exist. plus the map is useful by itself.
00129                 auto search = cellPositionMap_.find(cellID);
00130                 if(search == cellPositionMap_.end()) {
00131                     throw std::runtime_error("Error: cell " + std::to_string(cellID) + " is not valid");
00132                 }
00133                 return search->second;
00134             }
00135 
00141             XYCoords getCellCenterAbsolute(int cellModuleID) const {
00142                 return cellModulePositionMap_.at(cellModuleID);
00143             }
00144 
00149             std::vector<int> getNN(int cellModuleID) const {
00150               return NNMap_.at(cellModuleID);
00151             }
00152 
00157             std::vector<int> getNNN(int cellModuleID) const {
00158               return NNNMap_.at(cellModuleID);
00159             }
00160 
00165             bool isNN(int centerID, int probeID) const {
00166                 for (auto ID: getNN(centerID)) {
00167                     if (ID == probeID) return true;
00168                 }
00169                 return false;
00170             }
00171 
00176             bool isNNN(int centerID, int probeID) const {
00177                 for (auto ID: getNNN(centerID)) {
00178                     if (ID == probeID) return true;
00179                 }
00180                 return false;
00181             }
00182 
00187             double distanceToEdge(int cellModuleID) const;
00188             bool isEdgeCell(int cellModuleID) const {
00189                 return (distanceToEdge(cellModuleID) < cellR_);
00190             }
00191 
00195             const std::map<int, XYCoords>& getCellPositionMap() const { return cellPositionMap_; }

00200             const std::map<int, XYCoords>& getModulePositionMap() const { return modulePositionMap_; }

00206             const std::map<int, XYCoords>& getCellModulePositionMap() const { return cellModulePositionMap_; }

00211             std::vector<double> getCellMinMaxRadii() const { return {cellr_,cellR_}; }
00212 
00216             std::vector<double> getModuleMinMaxRadii() const { return {moduler_,moduleR_}; }
00217 
00222             bool isInside(double normX, double normY) const;
